00041 ClientKeepaliveHandler::ClientKeepaliveHandler(Comm *comm, PropertiesPtr &cfg,
00042                                                Session *session)
00043   : m_dead(false), m_comm(comm), m_session(session), m_session_id(0),
00044     m_last_known_event(0) {
00045   int error;
00046   uint16_t master_port;
00047   String master_host;
00048 
00049   HT_TRY("getting config values",
00050     m_verbose = cfg->get_bool("Hypertable.Verbose");
00051     master_host = cfg->get_str("Hyperspace.Master.Host");
00052     master_port = cfg->get_i16("Hyperspace.Master.Port");
00053     m_lease_interval = cfg->get_i32("Hyperspace.Lease.Interval");
00054     m_keep_alive_interval = cfg->get_i32("Hyperspace.KeepAlive.Interval"));
00055 
00056   HT_EXPECT(InetAddr::initialize(&m_master_addr, master_host.c_str(),
00057             master_port), Error::BAD_DOMAIN_NAME);
00058 
00059   boost::xtime_get(&m_last_keep_alive_send_time, boost::TIME_UTC);
00060   boost::xtime_get(&m_jeopardy_time, boost::TIME_UTC);
00061   xtime_add_millis(m_jeopardy_time, m_lease_interval);
00062 
00063   InetAddr::initialize(&m_local_addr, INADDR_ANY, 0);
00064 
00065   DispatchHandlerPtr dhp(this);
00066   m_comm->create_datagram_receive_socket(&m_local_addr, 0x10, dhp);
00067 
00068   CommBufPtr cbp(Hyperspace::Protocol::create_client_keepalive_request(
00069       m_session_id, m_last_known_event));
00070 
00071   if ((error = m_comm->send_datagram(m_master_addr, m_local_addr, cbp)
00072       != Error::OK)) {
00073     HT_ERRORF("Unable to send datagram - %s", Error::get_text(error));
00074     exit(1);
00075   }
00076 
00077   if ((error = m_comm->set_timer(m_keep_alive_interval, this))
00078       != Error::OK) {
00079     HT_ERRORF("Problem setting timer - %s", Error::get_text(error));
00080     exit(1);
00081   }
00082 }

00085 void ClientKeepaliveHandler::handle(Hypertable::EventPtr &event) {
00086   ScopedLock lock(m_mutex);
00087   int error;
00088 
00089   if (m_dead)
00090     return;
00091 
00098   if (event->type == Hypertable::Event::MESSAGE) {
00099     const uint8_t *decode_ptr = event->payload;
00100     size_t decode_remain = event->payload_len;
00101 
00102     try {
00103 
00104       // sanity check command code
00105       if (event->header.command >= Protocol::COMMAND_MAX)
00106         HT_THROWF(Error::PROTOCOL_ERROR, "Invalid command (%llu)",
00107                   (Llu)event->header.command);
00108 
00109       switch (event->header.command) {
00110       case Protocol::COMMAND_KEEPALIVE:
00111         {
00112           uint64_t session_id;
00113           uint32_t notifications;
00114           uint64_t handle, event_id;
00115           uint32_t event_mask;
00116           const char *name;
00117 
00118           if (m_session->get_state() == Session::STATE_EXPIRED)
00119             return;
00120 
00121           // update jeopardy time
00122           memcpy(&m_jeopardy_time, &m_last_keep_alive_send_time,
00123                  sizeof(boost::xtime));
00124           xtime_add_millis(m_jeopardy_time, m_lease_interval);
00125 
00126           session_id = decode_i64(&decode_ptr, &decode_remain);
00127           error = decode_i32(&decode_ptr, &decode_remain);
00128 
00129           if (error != Error::OK) {
00130             if (error != Error::HYPERSPACE_EXPIRED_SESSION) {
00131               HT_ERRORF("Master session error - %s", Error::get_text(error));
00132             }
00133             expire_session();
00134             return;
00135           }
00136 
00137           if (m_session_id == 0) {
00138             m_session_id = session_id;
00139             if (!m_conn_handler_ptr) {
00140               m_conn_handler_ptr = new ClientConnectionHandler(m_comm,
00141                   m_session, m_lease_interval);
00142               m_conn_handler_ptr->set_verbose_mode(m_verbose);
00143               m_conn_handler_ptr->set_session_id(m_session_id);
00144             }
00145           }
00146 
00147           notifications = decode_i32(&decode_ptr, &decode_remain);
00148 
00149           for (uint32_t i=0; i<notifications; i++) {
00150             handle = decode_i64(&decode_ptr, &decode_remain);
00151             event_id = decode_i64(&decode_ptr, &decode_remain);
00152             event_mask = decode_i32(&decode_ptr, &decode_remain);
00153 
00154             HandleMap::iterator iter = m_handle_map.find(handle);
00155             assert (iter != m_handle_map.end());
00156             ClientHandleStatePtr handle_state = (*iter).second;
00157 
00158             if (event_mask == EVENT_MASK_ATTR_SET ||
00159                 event_mask == EVENT_MASK_ATTR_DEL ||
00160                 event_mask == EVENT_MASK_CHILD_NODE_ADDED ||
00161                 event_mask == EVENT_MASK_CHILD_NODE_REMOVED) {
00162               name = decode_vstr(&decode_ptr, &decode_remain);
00163 
00164               if (event_id <= m_last_known_event)
00165                 continue;
00166 
00167               if (handle_state->callback) {
00168                 if (event_mask == EVENT_MASK_ATTR_SET)
00169                   handle_state->callback->attr_set(name);
00170                 else if (event_mask == EVENT_MASK_ATTR_DEL)
00171                   handle_state->callback->attr_del(name);
00172                 else if (event_mask == EVENT_MASK_CHILD_NODE_ADDED)
00173                   handle_state->callback->child_node_added(name);
00174                 else
00175                   handle_state->callback->child_node_removed(name);
00176               }
00177             }
00178             else if (event_mask == EVENT_MASK_LOCK_ACQUIRED) {
00179               uint32_t mode = decode_i32(&decode_ptr, &decode_remain);
00180 
00181               if (event_id <= m_last_known_event)
00182                 continue;
00183               if (handle_state->callback)
00184                 handle_state->callback->lock_acquired(mode);
00185             }
00186             else if (event_mask == EVENT_MASK_LOCK_RELEASED) {
00187               if (event_id <= m_last_known_event)
00188                 continue;
00189               if (handle_state->callback)
00190                 handle_state->callback->lock_released();
00191             }
00192             else if (event_mask == EVENT_MASK_LOCK_GRANTED) {
00193               uint32_t mode = decode_i32(&decode_ptr, &decode_remain);
00194               handle_state->lock_generation = decode_i64(&decode_ptr,
00195                                                          &decode_remain);
00196               if (event_id <= m_last_known_event)
00197                 continue;
00198 
00199               handle_state->lock_status = LOCK_STATUS_GRANTED;
00200               handle_state->sequencer->generation =
00201                   handle_state->lock_generation;
00202               handle_state->sequencer->mode = mode;
00203               handle_state->cond.notify_all();
00204             }
00205 
00206             m_last_known_event = event_id;
00207           }
00208 
00215           if (m_conn_handler_ptr->disconnected())
00216             m_conn_handler_ptr->initiate_connection(m_master_addr);
00217 
00218           if (notifications > 0) {
00219             CommBufPtr cbp(Protocol::create_client_keepalive_request(
00220                 m_session_id, m_last_known_event));
00221             boost::xtime_get(&m_last_keep_alive_send_time, boost::TIME_UTC);
00222             if ((error = m_comm->send_datagram(m_master_addr, m_local_addr, cbp)
00223                 != Error::OK)) {
00224               HT_ERRORF("Unable to send datagram - %s", Error::get_text(error));
00225               exit(1);
00226             }
00227           }
00228 
00229           assert(m_session_id == session_id);
00230         }
00231         break;
00232       default:
00233         HT_THROWF(Error::PROTOCOL_ERROR, "Unimplemented command (%llu)",
00234                   (Llu)event->header.command);
00235       }
00236     }
00237     catch (Exception &e) {
00238       HT_ERROR_OUT << e << HT_END;
00239     }
00240   }
00241   else if (event->type == Hypertable::Event::TIMER) {
00242     boost::xtime now;
00243     int state;
00244 
00245     // !!! fix - what about re-ordered packets?
00246 
00247     if ((state = m_session->get_state()) == Session::STATE_EXPIRED)
00248       return;
00249 
00250     boost::xtime_get(&now, boost::TIME_UTC);
00251 
00252     if (state == Session::STATE_SAFE) {
00253       if (xtime_cmp(m_jeopardy_time, now) < 0) {
00254         m_session->state_transition(Session::STATE_JEOPARDY);
00255       }
00256     }
00257     else if (m_session->expired()) {
00258       expire_session();
00259       return;
00260     }
00261 
00262     CommBufPtr cbp(Hyperspace::Protocol::create_client_keepalive_request(
00263         m_session_id, m_last_known_event));
00264 
00265     boost::xtime_get(&m_last_keep_alive_send_time, boost::TIME_UTC);
00266 
00267     if ((error = m_comm->send_datagram(m_master_addr, m_local_addr, cbp)
00268         != Error::OK)) {
00269       HT_ERRORF("Unable to send datagram - %s", Error::get_text(error));
00270       exit(1);
00271     }
00272 
00273     if ((error = m_comm->set_timer(m_keep_alive_interval, this))
00274         != Error::OK) {
00275       HT_ERRORF("Problem setting timer - %s", Error::get_text(error));
00276       exit(1);
00277     }
00278   }
00279   else {
00280     HT_INFOF("%s", event->to_str().c_str());
00281   }
00282 }
00283 
00284 
00285 void ClientKeepaliveHandler::expire_session() {
00286   m_session->state_transition(Session::STATE_EXPIRED);
00287   if (m_conn_handler_ptr)
00288     m_conn_handler_ptr->close();
00289   poll(0,0,2000);
00290   m_conn_handler_ptr = 0;
00291   return;
00292 }
00293 
00294 
00295 void ClientKeepaliveHandler::destroy_session() {
00296   int error;
00297 
00298   CommBufPtr cbp(Hyperspace::Protocol::create_client_keepalive_request(
00299                  m_session_id, m_last_known_event, true));
00300 
00301   if ((error = m_comm->send_datagram(m_master_addr, m_local_addr, cbp)
00302       != Error::OK))
00303     HT_ERRORF("Unable to send datagram - %s", Error::get_text(error));
00304 
00305   m_dead = true;
00306   //m_comm->close_socket(m_local_addr);
00307 }
